Plot: A video store clerk agrees to have his life filmed by a camera crew for a television show.
Title: Edtv
Writer: Émile Gaudreault (screenplay), Sylvie Bouchard (screenplay), Lowell Ganz (screenplay), Babaloo Mandel (screenplay)
Actors: Matthew McConaughey, Jenna Elfman, Woody Harrelson, Sally Kirkland
tomatoConsensus: If it's not as ambitious as The Truman Show in satirizing the voyeuristic nature of television, EdTV is an amiable, witty comedy with fine performances from Matthew McConaughey and Woody Harrelson.
